'''Enoi''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|An elderly Roparu man squints in your direction before blinking profusely. He hobbles closer, bare feet slapping the splintered floorboards of his abode.}}
Enoi is the informal leader of the Roparu in the Gullet, a man as thin and ravaged by malnutrition that he seems more like a walking corpse. Yet he lives - seeing and hearing much more than the Mataru think he does.

|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/): Enoi asks you to establish a food source for the Roparu.

{{Description|An elderly Roparu man squints in your direction before blinking profusely. He hobbles closer, bare feet slapping the splintered floorboards of his abode.}}
Enoi is the informal leader of the Roparu in the Gullet, a man as thin and ravaged by malnutrition that he seems more like a walking corpse. Yet he lives - seeing and hearing much more than the Mataru think he does.
